title: Why isn't Kai'Sa more banned at Worlds?
body: Those noobs, the teams should immediatly fire their analyst and coachs and sign some bunch of silver 3 analysts in order to have proper drafts.

replies.body:
Amumu is the happiest champion of all times.

.


.


.

...what? This is not a "say the dumbest thing possible" contest?

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=4wI5JzTf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-10-07T12:19:22.998+0000)
>
> Too high

If you were to express that sentiment in the form of a number, what would that number be?

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=4wI5JzTf,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-07T12:44:19.006+0000)
>
> 65 (%)

Where'd you get this number?  I was trying to find something, and I only found one where they had 53% win rate, but 250 games played... which obviously isn't right.

You're hired! Come up with better drafts! 

But for real, among playins there was definitely more priority elsewhere based on the team strengths. This undoubtedly changes come group stage.

because adcs aren't a priority target. Top lane is the priority.

The only team you might ban kai'sa out against is RNG/TL(because doublelift seems to be mentally lost on anything else atm)
